name: CLiCK BALL (Monzter-Games)
description:
This game is quite unique on it's own.....

It's a physics based fun to play game in which u have two modes :- Campaign and Survival. In campaign mode, u need to pass levels and collect coins, whereas in survival mode, you need to pass the levels consecutively failing to which you will have to play the game again from level 1. But you have another feature in survival to send your score to the leader-board which will compare you from other players of the game. And for passing each level you have to click various spots. Each click counts one move. The level has to be completed in limited moves after dodging the obstacles in the way likes ball, platforms, etc. Also there are portals which will, well, transport you from its Starting point to its Ending point.

This was made purely in python with a game library known as pygame and a physics engine called pymunk.

This was inspired by TWT's "Super Mini-Golf" but it's quite different in mechanism from that.

This was made as a fun project without any investment, but it took much time, effort and patience to make this possible.
